Name: Dream Stone 2
About the game: Dream Stone 2 is a slow paced and short puzzle/adventure/walking simulator game. Gameplay and world scructure is similiar to first game. Average gameplay time is 45-60 minutes. Escaping from the dream still continues on the sequel of Dream Stone. Why are you stuck in the dream? Why can't you escape? Dream Stone 2 is an adventure/puzzle game, your character continues to trying to escape from the dream since the first game. Main dream world is the same but the three puzzle maps are different from the previous ones. You solve puzzles to try to wake up from the dream which you couldn't, no matter what you've done. Whether you are going to escape this time or not, is up to you to see!
